name: osu!
subtitle: rhythm is just a *click* away!
description:
An AltStore and derivatives source for the rhythm game osu!.

Source made by apix and hosted at https://apikusu.github.io/altstore.

Updated daily at 04:30 UTC.

Banner/header:
- Artist: 1ufu9hfnhf9h (https://osu.ppy.sh/users/26908837)
- URL: https://assets.ppy.sh/user-contest-entries/15796/c8ba7b161f3dd1d211878dbc32d296e25c43a16f211824527b31cc44c1deb3e5_opt.jpg

apps.name: osu!
apps.subtitle: A free-to-win rhythm game. Rhythm is just a *click* away!
apps.localizedDescription:
This is the future – and final – iteration of the osu! game client which marks the beginning of an open era!

Currently known by and released under the release codename "lazer". As in sharper than cutting-edge.

news.title: osu!catch World Cup 2025: Round of 16 Recap
news.caption: This year's Round of 16 is now behind us, and with it came the first of many eliminations to come.

news.title: Survey: The State of Ranked
news.caption: Opinions wanted — help us pave the way forward for the future of the Ranked beatmap section!

news.title: New Featured Artist: Shirobon
news.caption: The weekend is here, and with it comes a new Featured Artist!

news.title: Capture The Achievement 2
news.caption: Do you enjoy scavenger hunting? Competing for a badge? Making use of your random osu! knowledge? Solving puzzles? Completing challenges? Playing with friends? If so, consider participating in Capture The Achievement 2!

news.title: osu!catch World Cup 2025: Round of 32 Recap
news.caption: Weekly CWC recaps are back! Tune in to check out everything that's happened, starting with the Round of 32 and its exciting matches.

news.title: Newspaper Cup 2025: Results
news.caption: The longest-running annual beatmapping contest for novice mappers, the Newspaper Cup (NPC), has closed its doors and is ready to present its winners!

news.title: BN Mentorship: Cycle 5 Sign-ups Open
news.caption: The BN Mentorship Program is back for another cycle of action!

news.title: Project Loved: June 2025
news.caption: Bask under the sunshine and rainbows and enjoy yourself some fresh Loved picks to start up your summer!
